Package com.mafiagame.csci3308.mafiagame

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    About
    This is the Activity that deal with the background information about Mafia Game
    ApplicationTest
    Testing Fundamentals
    BuildConfig  
    GameMain
    This is the main Class of MafiaGame.It deals with the game logic.
    HowToPlay
    This is the Activity that deal with all the rules about this game.
    MainActivity
    This is the mainmenu activity.
    NewGame
    This is the NewGame activity.
    OpeningActivity
    This is the Opening activity.
    OpeningDrawThread
    This is the drawing thread for the welcome page.The purpose of this thread is calling openingView's onDraw function in every 150 ms.
    OpeningRunThread
    This is the running thread for the welcome page.The purpose of this thread is making movement of the pictures.
    OpeningView
    This is the Opening class.

    This is the setting activity.
